languages.text: "Брось, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Дай мне с достоинством принять кару Его и насладиться вкусом покаяния". {n}Каллигос кривит губы в едкой ухмылке.{/n} "Трон побери, я уже запел как Инцендия... Слушай, {name}, обещай, что лично прикончишь меня, если буду молиться слишком усердно. Хватит с меня фанатизма... в любых проявлениях".

traits.locale_text: "Брось, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Дай мне с достоинством принять кару Его и насладиться вкусом покаяния". {n}Каллигос кривит губы в едкой ухмылке.{/n} "Трон побери, я уже запел как Инцендия... Слушай, {name}, обещай, что лично прикончишь меня, если буду молиться слишком усердно. Хватит с меня фанатизма... в любых проявлениях".

languages.text: "Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."
languages.original_text: "Брось, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Дай мне с достоинством принять кару Его и насладиться вкусом покаяния". {n}Каллигос кривит губы в едкой ухмылке.{/n} "Трон побери, я уже запел как Инцендия... Слушай, {name}, обещай, что лично прикончишь меня, если буду молиться слишком усердно. Хватит с меня фанатизма... в любых проявлениях".

traits.locale_text: "Come on, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... Look, {name}, promise to finish me off if I ever pray too much. Enough fanaticism for me... in any manifestation."

"Come on, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... Look, {name}, promise to finish me off if I ever pray too much. Enough fanaticism for me... in any manifestation."

Look, {name}, promise to finish me off if I ever pray too much. Enough fanaticism for me... in any manifestation."

Look, {name}, promise to finish me off if I ever pray too much. Enough fanaticism for me... in any manifestation."

"Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."

"Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."

languages.text: «Vamos, {mf|novato|novata}. Déjeme aceptar Su castigo y disfrutar de este momento de expiación». {n}Calligos tuerce la boca en una sonrisa mordaz.{/n} «Por el amor del Trono, ahora hablo igual que Incendia... {name}, prométame que me matará si empiezo a rezar más de la cuenta. Estoy harto de adoración... de todos los tipos».
languages.original_text: "Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos, {mf|novato|novata}. Déjeme aceptar Su castigo y disfrutar de este momento de expiación». {n}Calligos tuerce la boca en una sonrisa mordaz.{/n} «Por el amor del Trono, ahora hablo igual que Incendia... Mire, {name}, prométame que me rematará si empiezo a rezar más de la cuenta. Estoy harto de fanatismo... en todas sus manifestaciones».

languages.text: “不用了，新来的。让我接受祂的惩罚，享受赎罪的滋味吧。”{n}卡里戈斯咧开嘴，露出充满讽刺的微笑。{/n}“黄金王座在上，我现在说话的腔调就像因森蒂娅一样……你得答应我，{name}，如果我过一会儿开始没完没了地祈祷，记得一枪毙了我。我可受不了崇拜者……无论是什么样的崇拜者。”
languages.original_text: "Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."

traits.locale_text: “不用了，新来的。让我接受祂的惩罚，享受赎罪的滋味吧。”{n}卡里戈斯咧开嘴，露出充满讽刺的微笑。{/n}“黄金王座在上，我现在说话就像因森蒂娅一样……听着，{name}，答应我，如果我过一会儿开始没完没了地祈祷，记得把我干掉。那样的狂热可不适合我……各方面来说都是。”

languages.text: « Allons, novice, laissez-moi accepter Son châtiment et me délecter du goût de l'expiation, {n}dit Calligos avec un sourire sarcastique.{/n} Par le Trône, voilà que je parle comme Incendia, maintenant... {name}, je veux que vous me promettiez de m'achever si je me mets à prier constamment. J'ai eu ma dose de fanatisme... sous quelque forme que ce soit. »
languages.original_text: "Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, novice, laissez-moi accepter Son châtiment et me délecter du goût de l'expiation, {n}dit Calligos avec un sourire sarcastique.{/n} Par le Trône, voilà que je parle comme Incendia, maintenant... {name}, je veux que vous me promettiez de m'achever si je me mets à prier constamment. J'ai eu ma dose de fanatisme... sous quelque forme que ce soit. »

languages.text: 「さあ、新米よ。神の罰を受け入れ、贖罪の味に酔いしれようじゃないか」{n}カリゴスは唇を歪めて苛烈な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「王座のために、まるでインセンディアのような口ぶりだな…。{name}、俺が祈りすぎたら殺すと約束しろ。狂信はもうたくさんだ…どんな姿であれな」
languages.original_text: "Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、新米よ。神の罰を受け入れ、贖罪の味に酔いしれようじゃないか」{n}カリゴスは唇を歪めて苛烈な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「王座のために、まるでインセンディアのような口ぶりだな…。{name}、俺が祈りすぎたら殺すと約束しろ。狂信はもうたくさんだ…どんな姿であれな」

languages.text: "Kommt, neues Blut. Lasst mich Seine Strafe akzeptieren und im Geschmack der Reue baden." {n}Calligos verzieht seine Lippen zu einem ätzenden Lächeln.{/n} "Beim Thron, ich klinge schon wie Incendia ... {name}, versprecht mir, mich zu töten, falls ich jemals zu viel beten sollte. Ich habe genug von Kirchgängern ... egal, welcher Art."
languages.original_text: "Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt schon, neues Blut. Lasst mich seine Strafe akzeptieren und mich im Geschmack der Reue baden." {n}Calligos verzieht seine Lippen zu einem ätzenden Lächeln.{/n} "Beim Thron, ich klinge schon wie Incendia ... Bitte, {name}, versprecht mir, mich abzustechen, sollte ich jemals zu viel beten. Genug Fanatismus von mir ... in welcher Manifestation auch immer."

languages.text: "Hadi ama taze kan. Bırak da O'nun cezasını kabul edeyim, kefaretin tadına keyifle varayım." {n}Calligos'un dudakları bükülerek sert bir gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Taht beni bildiği gibi yapsın, İncendia gibi konuşmaya başladım... {name}, olur da çok fazla dua etmeye başlarsam beni öldüreceğine söz vermeni istiyorum. Her türden tapınan tip görmekten... Bıktım usandım."
languages.original_text: "Come now, new blood. Let me accept His punishment and revel in the taste of atonement." {n}Calligos twists his lips into a caustic smile.{/n} "For Throne's sake, I'm talking like Incendia now... {name}, I want you to promise that you'll kill me if I ever start praying too much. I have had enough of worshippers... of all kinds."
